mapper.select: insert into user(id, name, address) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{addr})

insert into houses(phone, rent, zulintype, quyu, ditie, address, xiaoqu, louceng, fangjiantype, dianti, fangjiandaxiao, sex, fukuantype, img, img_count, status, avasrc) values(#{phone}, #{rent}, #{zulintype}, #{quyu}, #{ditie}, #{address}, #{xiaoqu}, #{louceng}, #{fangjiantype}, #{dianti}, #{fangjiandaxiao}, #{sex}, #{fukuantype}, #{img}, #{img_count}, #{status}, #{avasrc})

select id, phone, rent, zulintype, quyu, ditie, address, xiaoqu, louceng, fangjiantype, dianti, fangjiandaxiao, sex, fukuantype, img, img_count, status, avasrc from houses limit #{itemcnt_start},#{itemcnt_end}

insert into owner(op, phone, name, ads, pswd, avasrc) values(#{op}, #{phone}, #{name}, #{ads}, #{pswd}, #{avasrc})
select `name`, avasrc from ${ident} where phone = #{phone} and pswd = #{pswd}
select id, phone, rent, zulintype, quyu, ditie, address, xiaoqu, louceng, fangjiantype, dianti, fangjiandaxiao, sex, fukuantype, img, img_count, status, avasrc from houses where id = #{id}
select id, phone, text, `date`, `name`, icon from tips limit #{itemcnt_start},#{itemcnt_end}
select id, phone, text, `date`, `name`, icon from tips where id = #{id}
insert into tips(phone, text, `date`, `name`, icon) values(#{phone}, #{text}, #{date}, #{name}, #{icon})

update houses set rent = #{rent}, zulintype = #{zulintype}, quyu = #{quyu}, ditie = #{ditie}, address = #{address}, xiaoqu = #{xiaoqu}, louceng = #{louceng}, fangjiantype = #{fangjiantype}, dianti = #{dianti}, fangjiandaxiao = #{fangjiandaxiao}, sex = #{sex}, fukuantype = #{fukuantype}, img = #{img}, img_count = #{img_count} where phone = #{phone}
delete from houses where id = #{id} and phone = #{phone}
delete from tips where id = #{id} and phone = #{phone}
